name: Looking: The Movie
summary: Almost a year after the last episode, Patrick has broken up with Kevin and moved to Denver. He returns to San Francisco for the wedding of Agustín and Eddie. Inspired by some advice from Richie and a one-night stand who met Kevin once, Patrick reaches out to Kevin in the hopes of closure. He learns that Kevin and Jon have gotten back together and plan on moving to London; after admonishing him for how things ended and admitting he loved him and wishing they had given their relationship a chance, Kevin offers Patrick his old job back. Meanwhile, Dom's attitudes are changing, Doris makes a major life decision, Agustín and Eddie face their issues and proceed with the wedding, and Richie's relationship with Brady (Who is showing signs of a serious drinking problem.) hits a breaking point. In the end, Patrick finds what he's been looking for all along in Richie.
